[[File:PrismScale.png|thumb|200px|The Prism Scale]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Prism Scale costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Mossdeep City]] in [[Hoenn]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Feebas.png|40px]] Feebas || [[File:Milotic.png|40px]] Milotic |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
